participant_1.name: Clara
participant_1.personality: Pragmatic and down-to-earth, Clara values practicality over trends. She has a competitive spirit and enjoys engaging in physical activities with her dog.
participant_1.background: i do not care about fashion. i hate the color orange. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i compete in dog agility classes.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and energetic, Ethan thrives on taking risks and enjoys sharing stories from his experiences. He values knowledge and has a deep appreciation for literature.
participant_2.background: i never broke a bone in my body ever in my life. i am a stunt double as my second job. i read twenty books a year. i was raised in a single parent household. i only eat kosher.
